entry.title: In the end, it's you and me again
entry.summary:
Author: pepsidisco

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,453Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

entry.title: Inheritance of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Pistolbag

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,494Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 55

Summary: In Gotham‚Äôs grim streets, there‚Äôs always a new face: an old ghost in a new skin. But when a young girl, feral and untrained, is discovered in a dark corner of Gotham's underground by Batman and Robin during a mission to stop David Cain, the dynamic of the Bat-Family is forever changed.

entry.title: a red swan song
entry.summary:
Author: ClarkeStetler

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,000Chapters: 15/18Kudos: 1,280

Summary: The night had promised to be a good one- a rarely and blessedly mundane one.So why was Bruce staring down at two of his sons... as actual children? And moreover- how did he fix it?Just another de-age fic, with heaping fluff, moral dilemmas, and hurt/comfort goodies baked in for you personally.

entry.title: Little B
entry.summary:
Author: Erilia_31

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,490Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Bruce Wayne gets turned into his twelve years old self.I don't know what other scenarios/interactions to write for this, so I only have one chapter, but I'll make more if I think of more. Or feel free to comment ideas and I can maybe write it.I've watched Gotham before, but it was a long while ago. I'm rewatching it, but I'm only in the first few episodes, so I might get things wrong. This probably won't be very Canon to anything, but I'll try. Feel free to leave advice.

entry.title: We Can Run Away (And Start A Family Inside Your House)
entry.summary:
Author: MaxieHoneyBee

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,110Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 139

Summary: The formation of the Justice League was huge. They start getting help requests from the U.N.Bruce and Clark are married and starting a family right under the noses of the whole League in secret until they are found to have children during an ‚Äúemergency meeting‚Äù.Bruce doesn‚Äôt trust the rest of the League as far as he can throw them and it shows but he doesn‚Äôt care.They acquire many children almost all at once, there is a highly skeptical case worker who has beef with Batman near the end, and the beef with Lex Luthor grows.Or Bruce and Clark adopt and acquire all seven of their children within two years of their marriage and it causes stress, miscommunication and issues with the Justice League.

entry.title: Midnight Oil
entry.summary:
Author: JHawk23

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,954Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 76

Summary: ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt sleep?‚Äù Jason mumbled.‚ÄúNope,‚Äù Dick eased the door closed, tossed his limp stuffed elephant to Jason like a football, and flopped onto the mattress. ‚ÄúNoticed you stopped your moaning and groaning a few hours ago, so I figured you were awake too.‚Äù‚ÄúYou‚Äôd think a fancy house like this would have thicker walls.‚Äù‚ÄúMini-NP?‚Äù Dick asked. ‚ÄúAll rules apply.‚ÄùJason wasn‚Äôt sure when this had started to become a ‚Äòthing.‚Äô Probably before he came home, but that was privileged information. Nightmare Piles were like Fight Club. Rule one: no one talked about it afterwards. The stuff they talked about‚Ä¶ if they talked‚Ä¶ was absolutely privileged. No sharing it with anyone else in the family. No using it against the sharer. Jason added that one.Physical contact was a must. That was a Dick rule. Jason tended to think of it as mutually assured destruction. More realistically it was Dick reminding himself that all his siblings were, in fact, alive. But they kept it up, even if Dick wasn‚Äôt there.Just me using my comfort characters as my own personal therapy avatars. No plot. Just conversations. A bit of fluff. Nonsense

entry.title: Your Love Is So (Hurt) Heartful
entry.summary:
Author: Ocyus_Stuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,642Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 209

Summary: Your father‚Äôs child body should not have been covered in bruises and broken bones.His youngest brother brought little Bruce‚Äôs hand up, resting his forehead against the back of B‚Äôs hands. ‚ÄúYou were supposed to be safe‚Äù, he growled into Bruce‚Äôs hand. He emphasised the word safe, spat the word out with so much offense that as if with enough strength, Damian could will his wish into existence and rewrite this cruel moment of Bruce‚Äôs past and morph it into something kinder, something more befitting for a man who will spend the rest of his adulthood covered in the same kind of bruises and walk the earth with bones broken ten, twenty times over from protecting a city that bites the hands that try to hold it with even the slightest hint of kindness and later, from protecting the whole world with the strength of his heart and the wit of his mind as his greatest weapon.‚ÄúYou were supposed to be l‚Äî" Damian‚Äôs breath hitched, and it was a terrible sound.Loved. Dick finished in his heart. You were supposed to be loved.

entry.title: Your Beauty Is That of Gentle Winter, My Dearest
entry.summary:
Author: Ocyus_Stuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,983Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 626

Summary: She remembers Bruce‚Äôs face - haunted and resigned with steel in his eyes. A flicker of Batman in the mild posture of Bruce Wayne. And how Stephanie wanted to give those old bags the verbal beatdown of a lifetime, but Bruce put a hand on her back and steered them away from the crowd. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not worth it,‚Äù he said. He barreled on when he saw Stephanie open her mouth, a retort already shaping on the tip of her tongue. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm used to it. I don‚Äôt want them to drag you into this‚Äù. As if they already don‚Äôt - Bruce Wayne and all of his charity cases.‚ÄúYou‚Äôre so pretty, you know?‚Äù she suddenly starts. Bruce slowly blinks, the way he does at the rare instance that something is confusing him and his brain can‚Äôt catch up fast enough to come up with a solution. ‚ÄúCome on, Jason. Back me up here‚Äù.Jason sighs. ‚ÄúYour so fucking pretty it makes me wanna vomit‚Äù. He turns away, hiding his face behind his hand, but she can still spot the hint of redness on the tip of his ears.orAn asshole slutshames Bruce Wayne at a gala, earning Stephnaie's ire. The old man won't do anything about it, but Stephanie will. She'll enhance his beauty, make him beautiful, unattainable - a true prince

entry.title: Red Velvet (Hurtful, Yet So Sweet)
entry.summary:
Author: hattersrabbit

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,186Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 50

Summary: "I hurt you again! I let another being cloud my mind, and I hurt you again-"Gloved hands with the sharpest of nails graze the aliens skin. Ice blue hues full of soft compassion that no one had ever seen in such a way."You could hurt me while under control a million times, and I would never love you any less."Or,The batkids are subjected to the sight of a mind controlled Superman essentially trying to murder their father.Low and behold, this wasn't the first time it's happened.

(He totally does.)Also, surprise‚Äîhe‚Äôs been the Watchtower‚Äôs secret baker this whole time.Cue chaos, tears, and one very emotional group hug.

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheLastWord

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,578Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 319

Summary: ‚ÄúI think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,‚Äù Bruce said, voice carefully neutral.¬†When a mysterious device sends the Batkids' future sons and daughters to the past, right in the middle of the cave, none of them is ready. Not the new kids, whose family as they know it is back in a different time, and certainly not Bruce's own children, too young to be parents.With the six now stuck in a time in which they don't exist yet, hurt by a future that will never be, the Batkids will have to decide what it truly means to be a family and how to face the ghosts of choices not yet taken.AKAThe Batkids meet their future children and everything gets complicated.- - - -Part of a series dedicated to the Batkids' kids, this is a STAND-ALONE fic.
